mapper.select: SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , P_CONTENT , P_SERVICE , CARE_LIST , P_MODE , M.USER_NO , USER_NAME , ADDRESS , CA_STATUS , FILE_PATH FROM PETSITTER P JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = P.USER_NO) WHERE M.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.USER_NO = M.USER_NO AND P_NO = #{petSitterNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PETSITTER WHERE P_MODE = 'Y'

SELECT P.P_NO , P.P_TITLE , P.CARE_LIST , M.ADDRESS , M.CA_STATUS , RS.START_DATE , RS.END_DATE , RS.REF_PNO , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW R WHERE REF_RESNO = RS.RES_NO AND R.STATUS = 'Y') REVIEW_COUNT FROM PETSITTER P LEFT JOIN MEMBER M USING (USER_NO) LEFT JOIN RESERVATION RS USING (USER_NO) LEFT JOIN REVIEW R ON (R.REF_RESNO = RS.RES_NO) WHERE P.P_MODE = 'Y' ORDER BY P.P_NO DESC
